name: Currency Jamaica
tagline: Currency Jamaica, a simple way to keep track of how much the JMD is being traded for and where to get the best price.
body:
# Currency Jamaica API.
This will provide a simple interface over HTTP for accessing the data.

## Supported Traders / Cambio
* Scotiabank
* National Commercial Bank
* Jamaica National Building Society
* FX Trader

## Supported Currencies
* USD
* CAD
* EUR
* GBP

## Endpoints

This route will return all the traders and all the currencies.
```
http://currencyja.herokuapp.com/api/traders.json
```

This route will return all the traders with the given currency.
```
http://currencyja.herokuapp.com/api/traders/(:currency).json
```
### 
  Options:
  `usd`
  `cad`


# Authors and Contributors
.
